meanings.definition: Not able to be exchanged for something else.
meanings.sent1: These two puzzle pieces are noninterchangeable.
meanings.sent2: The unique key is noninterchangeable with any other.
meanings.sent3: The noninterchangeable socks caused a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her noninterchangeable personality shines brightly in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The noninterchangeable colors of the rainbow are mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being substituted for another.
meanings.sent1: The noninterchangeable parts of the machine are crucial.
meanings.sent2: His noninterchangeable skills make him a valuable team member.
meanings.sent3: The noninterchangeable hats at the party led to confusion.
meanings.sent4: Their noninterchangeable opinions clashed like thunder and lightning.
meanings.sent5: The noninterchangeable flavors of the ice cream left us wanting more.
